text: Levels of intracellular protein were assessed following 24 h stimulation with PMA ( 162 nM ) or HK E . coli ( 5 x 107 CFU / ml ) .
( A ) Phospho - PKC increased in response to PMA and HK E . coli stimulation .
( B ) IkappaB decreased following stimulation with HK E . coli indicating NF-kappaB activation .
